title: How to Get an Uber Fare Estimate in Advance

steps.title: Launch the Uber app.
steps.content: Launch the Uber app.

steps.title: Tap "Set Pickup Location".
steps.content: Tap "Set Pickup Location". Upon opening, the app will use GPS and wi-fi to identify your exact, current location. To change the pickup location, you may either: [1] X Research source Tap on the box that lists your current location. Type in your desired pickup location. Move the map so that the pin (statically located in the center of the screen) is in the correct location.

steps.title: Tap and hold the bottom of the screen.
steps.content: Tap and hold the bottom of the screen. Your finger should be placed on the light gray rectangle that lists the Uber car options available in your city.

steps.title: Drag your finger upwards on the screen.
steps.content: Drag your finger upwards on the screen. The expanded box will list the driver's ETA, the MAX size of the vehicle, and your fare estimate.

steps.title: Select “Get Fare Estimate”.
steps.content: Select “Get Fare Estimate”. [2] X Research source If you select uberPOOL, this button is not available.

steps.title: Type in your destination.
steps.content: Type in your destination. You will return to the previous screen to view your updated fare estimate.

steps.title: Tap on the different Uber options available to compare fares.
steps.content: Tap on the different Uber options available to compare fares. If you select uberPOOL, this button is not available.

steps.title: Tap on the estimated fare to view additional pricing information.
steps.content: Tap on the estimated fare to view additional pricing information. A “Fare Detail” window will pop-up on your screen. It will provide you with the following information: Base Fare Cost per minute Cost per mile Booking Fee

steps.title: Launch the Uber app.
steps.content: Launch the Uber app. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your pickup location.
steps.content: Enter your pickup location. Uber uses wi-fi and GPS to identify your exact, current location. If you are getting picked up from a different location, you may manually change the address by tapping on the box that lists your current location and typing in your desired pickup location. [4] X Research source Alternatively, move the map so that the pin (statically located in the center of the screen) is in the correct location.

steps.title: Tap “Enter destination”.
steps.content: Tap “Enter destination”. This box is partially hidden by the “Enter pickup location” box.

steps.title: Type in your destination.
steps.content: Type in your destination. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap and hold the bottom of the screen.
steps.content: Tap and hold the bottom of the screen. Your finger should be placed on the light gray rectangle that lists the Uber car options available in your city.

steps.title: Drag your finger upwards on the screen.
steps.content: Drag your finger upwards on the screen. The expanded box will list the driver's ETA, the MAX size of the vehicle, and your fare estimate.

steps.title: Tap on the different Uber options available to compare fares.
steps.content: Tap on the different Uber options available to compare fares.

steps.title: Tap on the estimated fare to receive additional pricing information.
steps.content: Tap on the estimated fare to receive additional pricing information. A “Fare Detail” window will pop-up on your screen. It will contain the following information: [6] X Research source Base Fare Cost per minute Cost per mile Booking Fee

steps.title: Navigate to uber.com or click here.
steps.content: Navigate to uber.com or click here .

steps.title: Select “Ride”.
steps.content: Select “Ride”. Find this in the top menu bar.

steps.title: Scroll down to the “Pricing:
steps.content: Scroll down to the “Pricing: Get a fare estimate” section.

steps.title: Click “Enter pickup location”.
steps.content: Click “Enter pickup location”. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Type in the address of your pickup location.
steps.content: Type in the address of your pickup location. Alternatively, press the pointer icon if you are currently at the pickup location. This icon (an arrowhead pointing Northeast) is located within the “Enter pickup location” field. The Fare Estimator will use GPS to pinpoint your exact location and enter the address into the field automatically.

steps.title: Click “Enter destination”.
steps.content: Click “Enter destination”. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Type in the address of your destination.
steps.content: Type in the address of your destination.

steps.title: Click →.
steps.content: Click → . Find this button to the right of the “Enter destination” field. Pressing this button will generate a list of results.

steps.title: Review the results.
steps.content: Review the results. You will receive an estimate for every Uber option available in your city. A fare estimate will appear to the right of each option—the estimates will appear as a range of prices.

steps.title: Press the question mark icon to view additional information about each option.
steps.content: Press the question mark icon to view additional information about each option. Find this icon to the right of the fare estimate. You will receive the following information: Base Fare Cost Per Minute Cost Per Mile Booking Fee Minimum Fare Cancellation Fee
